definition: to get round fast/to spread like wildfire

sentences.english: Does not my son left leg tibiofibula fracture 9 months heal?
sentences.chinese: 我儿子左腿胫腓骨骨折9个月还没有愈合？

sentences.english: Stage II. Rupture of anterior tibiofibular ligament and interosseous ligament.
sentences.chinese: II度胫腓前韧带和骨间膜断裂。

sentences.english: Stage I. Rupture of anterior tibiofibular ligament.
Objective To investigate the value of MR imaging in diagnosing the injury of the tendon of tibialis posterior muscle.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价磁共振在胫后肌腱损伤中的应用价值。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of tibiofibular fracture treated by combined fixation technic.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨结合固定治疗胫腓骨骨折的疗效。

sentences.english: The tibial functional index(TFI) in all group are no significant difference. Conclusion:1.
sentences.chinese: 各组之间在各个时期的胫神经功能指数无显著不同。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce a bended intramedullary nail and its effect on treating tibiofibular fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍折弯髓内钉治疗胫腓骨骨折的方法与疗效。

sentences.english: Participants should bring their own sticks, mouth guard, shin pads.
sentences.chinese: 参加者需要自备球棍，牙箍，护胫。

sentences.english: Two players were fined for shinning opponent players.
sentences.chinese: 有两个队员因踢对方队员的胫而被罚款。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the treatment of ankle joint fracture combined with inferior tibiofibular joint split.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨踝关了骨折伴下胫腓关节分离的治疗方法。

sentences.english: The knee is the jointswheresthe thigh bone meets the large bone of the lower leg.
sentences.chinese: 膝盖是大腿骨和小腿胫的连接处。

sentences.english: The knee is the joints where the thigh bone meets thelarge bone of the lower leg.
sentences.chinese: 膝盖是大腿骨和小腿胫的连接处。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the effects of three fixations for open tibiofibula fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较开放性胫腓骨骨折三种不同固定方法的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the treatment method of tibiofibular fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胫腓骨粉碎骨折的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Methods We analyzed retrospectively 137 cases of complex tibial and fibular fractures.
sentences.chinese: 方法对137例复杂性胫腓骨骨折的治疗进行分析。

sentences.english: Syndesmosis width was not affected by the number of cortices purchased by the syndesmosis screw.
sentences.chinese: 下胫腓螺钉固定骨皮质的数目不影响下胫腓的宽度。

definition: ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment
